jobDescription: Job Purpose Loring Ward is a financial services company dedicated to helping independent financial advisors run better practices. The Advisor Services group works to enhance the experience of financial advisors by providing clients with error-free operations and superior customer service.  The Account Manager is the primary Service contact for assigned advisors, ensuring that superior service is delivered through dedication and a commitment to excellence. The candidate is responsible for understanding the nuances of the advisor and tailoring the servicing accordingly. The candidate works on a team to manage the servicing of all Loring Ward advisors. Duties may fluctuate with market volatility, seasonal volumes, and team coverage, so flexibility, the ability to work under pressure and within tight deadlines will be critical. Strong communication, attention to detail, and successful problem solving is essential to be successful in this role.
